thread.title: Associate Producer - New England - Sports Media
thread.title_full: Associate Producer - New England - Sports Media

title: Associate Producer - New England - Sports Media
text: Posted/Updated: 10-02-2015 Brief Job Description: This position will require candidate to support Producers and Directors in the production of live and live to tape studio based programs, including live news, sports talk shows...   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
